message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $140 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'd be happy to take it for $130.  What do you think?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
